oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Calvin McKissack to Thomas Elsa Jones, President of Fisk University
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: McKissack, Calvin L.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Finding Community
Schools
African American architects; Architectural firms; Fisk University (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Typed correspondence on letterhead of McKissack & McKissack, Registered Architects, 3 pages, signed Calvin L. McKissack
Text of the letter reveals that Mckissack & McKissack had been asked to propose plans for the expansion of the Fisk University campus and had already completed a topographical survey.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Fisk University, John Hope and Aurelia E. Franklin Library, Special Collections
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Fisk University, John Hope and Aurelia E. Franklin Library, Special Collections, Thomas E. Jones Collection, Box 37, folder1012, 1013, 1014
